message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $800,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I'm currently looking to spend closer to $700,000.  Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
